pages.text: In the world of Maleficium, vampires possess a unique ability known as $(6)Compulsion$(). This power allows them to exert control over the minds of others, bending their will to serve the vampire's desires.$(br2)This entry will explain how to use this ability effectively.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: To use Compulsion, simply press your Compulsion keybind ($(k:maleficium.compel)) while looking at a target. When doing this, the target will be either compelled to follow you or do something else, depending on the mob.

pages.title: Villagers
pages.text: Unlike other mobs, villagers have an extra option when using Compulsion. When you hold down crouch while using Compulsion on a villager, you can $(6)compel them to offer cheaper trades$().
